__TOC__

<nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org|Ubuntuforums.org]]</nowiki> is where Ubuntu users can chat with other users. The software that runs the forums is <nowiki>[[http://www.vbulletin.com/|vBulletin 3.0.7]]</nowiki>. 

The forum also collect messages from some of the e-mail mailing lists. 

You can access the forums through your web-browser and you can also configure the system to e-mail you updates. If you prefer updates in RSS you can get feeds by clicking on the orange RSS icon at the top of any forum's main page.
